name: Andrélon Intense conditioner care&repair
composition: INGREDIËNTEN: Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cocos Nucifera Oil (Kokosolie), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil (Amandelolie), Lysine HCl, Hydrolyzed Keratin (Keratine), Camellia Sinensis Leaf (Groene Thee) Extract, Paraffinum Liquidum, Gluconolactone, Trehalose, Sodium Sulfate, Lactic Acid, Dipropylene Glycol, Parfum, Amodimethicone, Sodium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, Cetrimonium Chloride, PEG-7 Propylheptyl Ether, Phenoxyethanol, Magnesium Nitrate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Limonene, Linalool.
